attributes.additional_details:
Britain and Nepal have a long heritage of support. The current Covid situation in the country is spiralling out of control and hospitals are already overwhelmed. 
The UK's support by way of sending oxygen cylinders WILL save lives
attributes.background: Help support the Nepalese people with vital oxygen supplies to minimise unnecessary deaths during their current Covid explosion

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585395
